NimGame

Class Nim

  • java.lang.Object
    • NimGame.Nim

  • public class Nim
extends java.lang.Object
    The model for the Nim game. [[ To play you need to add an interface. ]]

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Nim()
      Creates (the model for) a new Nim game.
      Nim(int initialSticks)
      Creates (the model for) a new Nim game with an arbitrary number of sticks.

      Update the game by removing the specified number of sticks.

      Return whose turn it is (Player 1 or Player 2).
